channel.title: Wsl2 on Not a Peeker of Nature
channel.description: Recent content in Wsl2 on Not a Peeker of Nature

item.title: Quickstart of wsl2
item.description:
#Install wsl2

I usually use VPN, so not only will it require me to set the network (wifi/ethernet), but also require me to set the DNS of the wsl2 as 8.8.8.8 and 8.8.4.4

#Install conda

Why?

Configuring environment is quite important, and sometimes annoying especially for a beginner. The issues can be various, so I’d like to collect them in the post. There are two main benefits for me: one is to save time if I have the same issue next time, another is to build a framework of virtual environment so that I can really understand how it works.
